griffon.core.mvc

Interface MVCGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MVCHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TypedMVCGroup<M,V,C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMVCGroup, AbstractTypedMVCGroup, DefaultMVCGroup, DelegatingMVCGroup, GroovyAwareMVCGroup

    public interface MVCGroup
extends MVCHandler
    Defines an MVC group and its contents
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Destroys the current group.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,MVCGroup> getChildrenGroups()
      Returns an immutable view of all children groups for which this group is a parent
      MVCGroupConfiguration getConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration of this group.
      Context getContext()
      Returns the context belonging to this group.
      GriffonController getController()
      Returns the Controller portion of this group.

      Returns the specified member type.

      Returns the Model portion of this group.

      Returns the id of the group.

      Returns the parent MVCGroup of this group.

      Returns the View portion of this group.
      boolean isAlive()
      Returns whether this group has been destroyed or not.
      void notifyMVCGroupDestroyed(java.lang.String mvcId)
      Notifies the group when another MVC group has been destroyed, potentially a child group.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfiguration

        @Nonnull
MVCGroupConfiguration getConfiguration()
        Returns the configuration of this group.
        Returns:
        the configuration used to instantiate this group.

      • getMvcType

        @Nonnull
java.lang.String getMvcType()
        Returns the type of this group as set in the application's configuration.
        Returns:
        the type of the group

      • getMvcId

        @Nonnull
java.lang.String getMvcId()
        Returns the id of the group. Ids are used to uniquely identify a group instance.
        Returns:
        the id of this group.

      • getModel

        @Nullable
GriffonModel getModel()
        Returns the Model portion of this group.
        Returns:
        a GriffonModel instance if the group has a model member, null otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the group has been destroyed already

      • getView

        @Nullable
GriffonView getView()
        Returns the View portion of this group.
        Returns:
        a GriffonView instance if the group has a view member, null otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the group has been destroyed already

      • getController

        @Nullable
GriffonController getController()
        Returns the Controller portion of this group.
        Returns:
        a GriffonController instance if the group has a controller member, null otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the group has been destroyed already

      • getMember

        @Nullable
java.lang.Object getMember(@Nonnull
                                     java.lang.String name)
        Returns the specified member type.
        Parameters:
        name - the type of member to retrieve
        Returns:
        the selected MVC member if a match is found, null otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the group has been destroyed already

      • getMembers

        @Nonnull
java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getMembers()
        Returns a read-only view of all instance members.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable Map view of all members.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the group has been destroyed already

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroys the current group. Should only be called once.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the group has been destroyed already

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Returns whether this group has been destroyed or not.
        Returns:
        true if the group has not been destroyed yet, false otherwise

      • getContext

        @Nonnull
Context getContext()
        Returns the context belonging to this group.
        Since:
        2.2.0

      • getParentGroup

        @Nullable
MVCGroup getParentGroup()
        Returns the parent MVCGroup of this group.

        The parent may be null if this is a top level MVC group.

        Since:
        2.2.0

      • getChildrenGroups

        @Nonnull
java.util.Map<java.lang.String,MVCGroup> getChildrenGroups()
        Returns an immutable view of all children groups for which this group is a parent
        Returns:
        an immutable view of children groups, keyed by mvcId.
        Since:
        2.4.0

      • notifyMVCGroupDestroyed

        void notifyMVCGroupDestroyed(@Nonnull
                             java.lang.String mvcId)
        Notifies the group when another MVC group has been destroyed, potentially a child group.
        Parameters:
        mvcId - the id of the group that has been destroyed
        Since:
        2.4.0
